subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Prince, the reclusive pop icon, turned his back to the audience of a few hundred reporters at a news conference Thursday and burst into a hard-driving guitar riff in a preview of his Super Bowl XLI halftime show.
snippet: Prince, the reclusive pop icon, turned his back to the audience of a few hundred reporters at a news conference Thursday and burst into a hard-driving guitar riff in a preview of his Super Bowl XLI halftime show.
